landing.title:
Businesses
Trust Engine
landing.description:
Lum Network introduces the first decentralized protocol
for businesses to build authentic trust with their customers.

store.title: Content stamping
store.description: Authenticate and stamp content on-chain to ensure information is accurate, verified and publicly accessible while abiding with data privacy regulations.

tracability.title: Traceability
tracability.description: We introduce the Beam protocol to create temporary mutable states on the immutable decentralized Lum Network’s ledger. Thus enabling fully traceable content updates.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: The key element to create trust between businesses and their customers. Using a tamper proof, public decentralized ledger designed for accessibility.

practices.title: Business practices
practices.description: The new standard for companies to foster trust with their customers. The Lum Network’s aims to become a norm for the companies of the future.

companies.title:
Not a disruption,
but an evolution
companies.description:
Enabling major third parties working between
retailers and their customers to evolve rather
than being disrupted by new technologies.

trust.title:
Focused on
large scale applications
trust.description:
The Lum Foundation is focused on working with
trusted third parties to quickly onboard
thousands of retailers and millions of customers.

community.title:
To create a massive
community of Lum members
community.description:
The Lum Network is designed to be the trust
layer for millions of users without exposing the
complexity of the underlying technology.

rewards.title: Using a modern Universal Reward
rewards.description: In return for value creation made by their users, we enabled businesses to benefit from on-chain rewards. Using a tangible asset, Lum Network’s native digital token, the LUM.

poweredBy.title:
Powered by
the
poweredBy.description:
Lum comes from the word “light” and expresses the value created
by and for consumers throughout the purchasing experience cycle.

It is the fuel of the Lum Network and is used by businesses to store UGC
and reward their customers, by validators and delegators to secure
the network and many more.

security.title: BECOME THE FUTURE
security.description: Businesses use the Lum to pave the way of innovation in their respective fields.

stake.title: SECURE THE CHAIN
stake.description: The Lum is one of the key elements of the network as it allows its members to secure its usage using Delegated Proof-of-Stake.

future.title: STAKE AND EARN
future.description: Every single Lum holder can participate in securing the network by staking their Lum and getting rewarded for it.

pOfS.description:
The most advanced and secure
Delegated Proof-Of-Stake algorithm
is used to secure the network.

carbon.title: Minimal carbon footprint
carbon.description:
Lum Network is designed to
be sustainable and uses DPOS
which consumes 99% less energy than proof of work.

costs.title: Low transactions cost
costs.description:
Having a very low transaction cost
to enable its applications to remain
competitive and efficient.

blocks.title: Fast block speed
blocks.description:
Lum Network processes blocks
under 10 seconds, enabling its users
to benefit from fast transactions.
